node.text:
Ocean air, salty hair, not a care, take me there in a blink! Well getting here is a breeze. It is the going away part that is going to be the hardest when you vacation at The Raviz Kovalam.

For bookings contact: 0471 – 3051234, 1800-4252-2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com, reservations@theraviz.com
